briefTitle: PiA: Prognosis Used Every Day for Patients With Operable Breast Cancer - Comparison of Invasion Factors uPA/PAI-1 With Other Prognostic Factors
officialTitle: PiA Trial: a Cross-sectional, Multicenter, Consecutive Cohort Evaluating the Distribution of uPA/PAI-1 Versus St. Gallen Algorithm in >1000 Prospectively Included Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* newly diagnosed breast cancer
* no metastasis detected
* operation for breast cancer
* female patient
* unilateral breast cancer
* informed consent given
* age min. 18 yrs.

Exclusion Criteria:

* metastasis of breast cancer
* bilateral breast cancer
* other cancer within the last 5yrs
